name: Red Rope: Don't Fall Behind
description: Red Rope is a terrifying, enigmatic adventure for 1 or 2 players who want to test their bond. Explore the Labyrinth, get acquainted with its bizarre inhabitants, its secrets and its rules. Face enemies, traps, puzzles, and ferocious bosses. Only the best will find the way out and become heroes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews.review_text: THIS IS A CLOSED BETA GAME AT THE TIME OF THE REVIEW, DONT EXPECT TONS OF FUN AND FEATURES

Great graphics, sweet sound design, and a cool gameplay even though the controls are quite simple (in fact you can play both players at one time, even though it becomes quite hard... your choice). Red Rope is a fantastic game, a little gem.
A game made with notable taste and intelligence.   A small jewel of the indie world.

I've got this game from the closed beta release, and loved every minute of it. Beautiful pixel art and great original gameplay. The controls are very simple, but you have to be very well coordinated with your partner to defeat every challenging room of this game. There's not much story to talk about, since you simply appear in the game and everything is quite crazy and unexplained, but makes you want to go further, to understand what's going on.
